properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 4:09AM AKST until February 21 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Visibility one half
mile or less at times. Less than 1 inch of additional snow
accumulation expected. Wind chills to 50 below. Travel will be
difficult.

* WHERE...Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...Until midnight tonight.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 50 mph will cause low
visibility in blowing snow. Significant drifting snow will
occur. Cold wind chills to 50 below zero will cause frostbite
in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Conditions are
much less severe at St Lawrence Island.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of
blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT
